Verses: 1 pinnum Yobu Than Prasanga Vaakkiyaththaith Thodarndhu Sonnadhu:
2 sendrupona Maadhangalilum, Dhevan Ennaik Kaappaatrivandha Naatkalilum Enakku Undaayirundha Seer Ippozhudhu Irundhaal Nalamaayirukkum.
3 appozhudhu Avar Theebam En Thalaiyinmel Pragaasiththadhu; Avar Arulina Velichchaththinaal Irulaik Kadandhuponen.
4 dhevanudaiya Ragasiya Seyal En Koodaaraththinmel Irundhadhu.
5 appozhudhu Sarvavallavar Ennodirundhaar; En Pillaigal Ennai Soozhndhirundhaargal.
6 en Paadhangalai Naan Neyyinaal Kazhuvinen; Kanmalaigalilirundhu Enakkaaga Enney Nadhipola Odivandhadhu; Andha Selvanaatkalin Seer Ippodhirundhaal Nalamaayirukkum.
7 naan Pattanaveedhiyaal Vaasalukkul Purappattuppoi, Veedhiyil En Aasanaththaip Podumpodhu,
8 vaalibar Ennaik Kandu Oliththukkolvaargal; Mudhiyor Ezhundhirundhu Nirpaargal.
9 prabukkal Pesugiradhai Niruththi, Kaiyinaal Thangal Vaayaip Poththikkolvaargal.
10 periyorin Saththam Adangi Avargal Naakku Avargal Melvaayodu Ottikkollum.
11 ennaik Ketta Kaadhu Ennai Baakkiyavaan Endradhu; Ennaik Kanda Kan Enakku Saatchiyittadhu.
12 muraiyidugira Ezhaiyaiyum, Thikkatra Pillaiyaiyum, Udhaviyatravanaiyum Ratchiththen.
13 kettuppoga Irundhavanudaiya Aaseervaadham Enmel Vandhadhu; Vidhavaiyin Irudhayaththai Gembeerikkappanninen.
14 needhiyaith Thariththukkonden; Adhu En Uduppaayirundhadhu; En Nyaayam Enakku Saalvaiyum Paagaiyumaai Irundhadhu.
15 naan Kurudanukkuk Kannum, Sappaanikkuk Kaalumaayirundhen.
16 naan Eliyavargalukkuth Thagappanaayirundhu, Naan Ariyaadha Vazhakkai Aaraaindhupaarththen.
17 naan Aniyaayakkaararudaiya Kadaivaaip Parkalai Udaiththu, Avargal Pariththadhai Avargal Parkalilirundhu Pidunginen.
18 en Koottile Naan Jeeviththuppoven; En Naatkalai Manalaththanaiyaaip Perugappannuven Endren.
19 en Ver Thanneergalin Oramaaip Padarndhadhu; En Kilaiyinmel Pani Raamuzhudhum Thangiyirundhadhu.
20 en Magimai Ennil Sezhiththongi, En Kaiyilulla En Vil Pudhuppelan Kondadhu.
21 enakku Sevikoduththuk Kaaththirundhaargal; En Aalosanaiyaik Kettu Mavunamaayirundhaargal.
22 en Pechchukkup Pesaamalirundhaargal; En Vasanam Avargalmel Thulithuliyaai Vizhundhadhu.
23 mazhaikkuk Kaaththirukkiradhupol Enakkuk Kaaththirundhu, Pinmaarikku Aasaiyullavargalpol Thangal Vaayai Aavendru Thirandhirundhaargal.
24 naan Avargalaip Paarththu Nagaikkumpodhu, Avargal Thunigarankollavillai; En Mugakkalaiyai Maarachcheyyavum Illai.
25 avargal Vazhiye Poga Enakku Siththamaagumpodhu, Naan Thalaivanaai Utkaarndhu, Raanuvaththukkul Raajaavaippolum, Dhukkiththavargalaith Thetraravupannugiravanaippolum Irundhen.
